forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun lingers in the late afternoon sky, Downtown San Francisco basks in a pleasantly warm embrace, with temperatures hovering near 65 degrees. The light breeze from the west southwest carries a gentle reminder of the ocean’s presence, rustling leaves and whisking away any lingering cobwebs of humidity. The bright blue overhead is punctuated only by feathery clouds skimming nearby hills, giving the impression of a day that is both inviting and meticulous in its clarity. 

As evening approaches, the air will cool to around 52 degrees, so it would be wise to layer up as dusk descends, perhaps donning a lightweight jacket or a cozy cardigan to ward off the chill that often sweeps in from the bay. Opportunities for spirited strolls along the Embarcadero beckon, as does settling down at a charming café for a quiet moment of solitude or conversation, admiring the shifting colors of the twilight sky. Whether one finds solace in the gentle ebb of the tide or the hum of the city, tonight paints the perfect canvas for transitioning into the evening’s tranquil embrace.
